thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com
thread.title: Ellen

author: Ellen
title: Ellen
text: I was nervous to use a site to purchase a gift card, but I'm happy I trusted other reviews! I was able to save around 10% on gift cards and received the online code for the gift card 10 minutes after purchasing the gift card! The instructions were clear and the amounts were correct. Excellent service and experience. I'll be sure to use CardKangaroo for future gift card purchases!
